desc: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.
cmb:
90/90/90/90
45/40/35/30
lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher are from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.
name: clinkz_strafe

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
notes:
Searing Arrows deal damage to structures.
The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.
cmb:
10
0
lore: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
name: clinkz_searing_arrows

desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.
notes:
Will not break most channeling of spells or items upon activation.
Has a fadetime of 0.6 seconds.
cmb:
75/75/75/75
20/19/18/17
lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
name: clinkz_wind_walk

desc: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.
notes:
If the target is an enemy, Clinkz will gain the correct experience and gold.
Increases Clinkz' current and max HP.
When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.
cmb:
100/100/100
45/35/25
lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
name: clinkz_death_pact
